    • Uses of GameCharacter in skynail.domain

      Subclasses of GameCharacter in skynail.domain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Companion
      Companions are specialised Game Characters that are part of player parties.
      class  Monster
      Monsters are specialised GameCharacters present in dungeons.
